summary: Dawnbreaker's explosion effect no longer launches loot.
descriptionHtml: Your Jenga towers will no longer be in danger when the undead invade your home. Reduces the force of the ExplosionTurnUndeadMass01 explosion used by Dawnbreaker from 15 to 0, so loot no longer gets catapulted across the room. Undead will still be staggered. Should be compatible with any mod that alters Dawnbreaker, as long as it still uses the Merdia's Retribution effect.
author: ColonelCorn
